Key Match Events: Jack Flaherty pitched a perfect game with 20 strikeouts
Max Muncy hit a two-RBI single in the first inning
Shohei Ohtani followed suit with an RBI single in the second
A trio of guys each hit an RBI single in the fourth to put the Dodgers up 6-0
Mookie Betts hit a walk-off grand slam in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers have gone 33 postseason innings without allowing a single run
The Mets are in early trouble with Kodai Senga walking the bases loaded with one out
The Mets hope to get three innings out of Kodai Senga in Game 1
The Dodgers could go bullpen game in Game 2 with Walker Buehler in Game 3 depending on usage tonight
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers have matched the MLB postseason record with 33 consecutive shutout innings
The Mets will have quite a hole to climb out of once they get back to Citi Field
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jack Flaherty allowed just two hits while striking out six in his start
Daniel Hudson just barely made it out of the inning without allowing a run
The game went into 15 innings before a decisive home run by Mike Trout
